Highly qualified certified systems engineer / architect / consultant with more than 13 years of experience in designing, building and supporting complex Spectrum Protect ( Tivoli Storage Manager, ADSTAR Distributed Storage Manager, ADSM) at the biggest Hungarian companies.

Team player and problem-solver with very good communication and interpersonal skills.
